title: Client issues still persisting?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So I'm having several different problems with the client, and here's one of them.

selecting roles, it takes up to 60 seconds for the selected roles to come through, while resetting to unselected several times possibly.

would the hextech repair tool help me with loading times, or is this just the client being poor?

replies.body:
Hey

Thanks for sharing this.  When did this start for you? And what ISP do you connect with?

Cheers
MIndstar

> [{quoted}](name=Agent Mindstar,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fBtV6xHb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-18T10:51:32.284+0000)
>
> Hey
> 
> Thanks for sharing this.  When did this start for you? And what ISP do you connect with?
> 
> Cheers
> MIndstar

I have the same issue but i'm stuck in ARAM lobby, 

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/jn4Asega-cannot-leave-lobby-tried-everything



send halp ples :(

Getting the same thing on iiNet Perth. Uh oh. It was fine last night - only noticed it half an hour ago when I played my warm up ARAM game.

Edit: General issue with the client seems to be that things are generally loading very, very slowly or not at all - it's not just ranked role select for me. E.g. the home screen only displays an error message and after I finished my game, I got stuck in the post match lobby despite clicking the quit button (which was greyed out). Gameplay didn't appear to be affected in the one game I played.
I'm getting this as well, started about mid day, ISP is iinet. I live in Perth.

I'm connecting through IInet, and still have issues with client loading times.

One that I've dealt with but don't have a gif of, when I get out of a game, it takes me a good 15+ seconds to load the honor screen, and thus, the post game lobby in general
Hi friend! Are you still having client issues at this time?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fBtV6xHb,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-10-28T23:37:39.682+0000)
>
> Hi friend! Are you still having client issues at this time?

Been at PAX the last few days, and working before that, so I can't give a definitive answer. I believe there was a patch recently, it may have included some bug fixes, as there's nothing to report after one game ( or I haven't noticed / encountered them )

will update if I find them again.

Edit; https://gyazo.com/3a48d1e56a77a9f97f7f8e33d1ad4039

After a game was remade, the post-game lobby failed to load for a LONG time, and by the time I got in, everyone else had loaded, talked, and left.

I had enough time to NOTICE it was taking forever, open up gyazo, make that 5 second snap, and then when it finished I counted to 28 before it finally loaded. So probably just under a minute.
When was this GIF taken? Are you only having these issues with the client, or are you noticing this issue in other places as well?

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fBtV6xHb,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-31T12:36:08.367+0000)
>
> When was this GIF taken? Are you only having these issues with the client, or are you noticing this issue in other places as well?

Got new issues.

https://gyazo.com/04e71c6b9dcc6346c5362737ec3d3ed6

seen others complaining about this, but haven't looked for a solution yet. There might be an obvious one, but if not, this deserves your attention.

ALL lobbies don't work. A little game breaking.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=fBtV6xHb,comment-id=0006000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-31T12:36:08.367+0000)
>
> When was this GIF taken? Are you only having these issues with the client, or are you noticing this issue in other places as well?

gif was taken as I made the comment ( 3 days ago )

the issues occur only on the client. in game is completely fine.



As a sidenote, another issue I'm having, whenever I log in, it tells me my friends have received their gifts. EVERY time. I try exiting out of the pop ups, they still reappear.

Having issues connecting to games now though. Just lost LP because the game was remade with me not being able to connect to it - got a "unable to contact authentication server" message. Had an issue getting DC'd from a game last night as well. Was whatever you changed on your end or was it something to do with iiNet? LoL has been pretty stable until recently for me.

Hi folks

We identified a potential source of the problem - can you please retry and let me know if it is fixed for you?

Cheers!
Mindstar

Yep, things working a lot faster and smoother for me now. Thanks!

Edit: Actually faster and smoother than before even - my client usually takes a little while (seconds) to load things when switching tabs, etc. and now it's barely lagging. What did you change?

Thanks for the updates guys - it does seem to be pointing to a particular common point so far...


One thing you might be able to do is perform a traceroute to our servers.  Here's how:
[instructions on how to perform a trace route](https://support.cloudflare.com/hc/en-us/articles/200169336-How-do-I-run-a-traceroute-)  
** Replace "yourdomain.com" with this IP address: prod.oc1.lol.riotgames.com **

* Send the output of the trace route through to ocelivereports@riotgames.com  ( _we do not provide support on this email, but use it to collect information sometimes_ )
* We'll check it out and see if there's anything we can do at Riot's end to improve connectivity back to iiNet

Same here James...
IINET as well. 
Takes more than 30 sec to select a queue...

Ditto over here, ISP also iinet, based on Perth

Very very slow, unable to start a match

Worked fine last night
